subject: College Athletics
Television
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: No football team in the Big East was among the top 30 teams last season, but the conference stands on the verge of completed a lucrative TV deal for the rights to its games within the next year.
snippet: No football team in the Big East was among the top 30 teams last season, but the conference stands on the verge of completed a lucrative TV deal for the rights to its games within the next year.
